description:
Provides a basic 101 overview of Accounting.

Includes following topics:

Introduction,
Vocabulary,
Double Entry Accounting,
Accounting Cycle,
Example of the Accounting Cycle,
Managerial and Cost Accounting,
Cash and Accrual basis of Accounting and Adjusting,
Accounting for a Merchandising business,
Accounting for Inventory,
Sarbanes-Oxley,
Accounting for Receivables,
Accounting for Depreciation,
Corporations,
Accounting Example.

Also added search based on customer feedback.

Please write to us. We would love to improve this app.
